group_1.textLeft: ...Okay, got it!
Thank you for everything, Touka!
I'll contact you later!

group_1.textRight: Well that was some phone call.

group_1.textLeft: I heard something like...it's getting worse?
You were talking about the game, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
It was about "Little Vacation".
For now, it seems Touka's stopping the game's time.

group_1.textLeft: Stopping its time...?
Did somethin' dangerous happen just now?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I guess so.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah definitely... It seems like the characters@in the game...
...were able to identify Ui's device of@their own volition.
They even called you...
If this were to escalate, it'd be pretty bad, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
Because my phone doesn't have that game, right?
Ah, yeah, that'd mean...

group_1.textLeft: Right, we don't know who they might call next!
They might even place a delivery order at the real Banbanzai!

group_1.textRight: Where'd it go wrong for this to happen...?
I didn't understand when I was listening to her,@but...
The "Wishing Star" on that side...
...is somehow connected to the internet@on this side.

group_1.textLeft: ...Ain't that a real bad bug!?
It should be okay if there's some type of@safeguard...?

group_1.textRight: It doesn't look like it's okay...

group_1.textLeft: Right, if they can access the internet,
who knows what kind of trouble might happen@next.

group_1.textRight: Next time it might not stop at just a phone call...

group_1.textLeft: I'm really sorry to make this comparison...
But they can move around freely like computer@viruses.

group_1.textRight: If the characters end up makin' a mess, who's gonna get blamed?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... I guess Touka?

group_1.textRight: For her this's especially bad news!
Yeah...but you see.
For Touka,
it's natural for her to do things on her own,
but because the game was started due to my words,
she wants to listen to my viewpoint before she@makes a decision.

group_1.textLeft: So that's why she called then.

group_1.textRight: Yeah.
...She also said it was perfect that you guys are here.

group_1.textLeft: Our other selves are the ones causin' this@huge mess...
